abstract: JPMorgan Chase incurred losses of about $1.5 billion for the quarter to date, as it continued to be hurt by wider credit spreads, lower levels of liquidity, as well as the disruption in the credit and mortgage markets, the bank said in a regulatory filing.

lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase incurred losses of about $1.5 billion for the quarter to date, as it continued to be hurt by wider credit spreads, lower levels of liquidity, as well as the disruption in the credit and mortgage markets, the bank said in a regulatory filing.

headline.main: JPMorgan Has Taken $1.5 Billion Loss Since July
